AR 46. The undertaking may also distinguish between short-, medium- and long-term targets covering
the same policy commitment. For example, the undertaking may have as a main objective to
employ community members at a local mining site, with the long-term goal of staffing 100%
locally by 2025, and with the short-term objective of adding x percent of local employees every
year up and until 2025.
